official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey lands acquired for the Sallisaw Creek project, Sequoyah County, Oklahoma.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey lands previously acquired by the United States for the Sallisaw Creek project in Sequoyah County, Oklahoma. Directs the Secretary to give first right of purchase to previous owners of such land. Provides for: (1) notification to previous owners; and (2) sale by public auction of land not otherwise purchased.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey lands acquired for the Sallisaw Creek project, Sequoyah County, Oklahoma.
